sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container id="layout-container">
    <el-aside id="layout-aside" :width="collapse === true ? '50px' : '175px'">
      <LayoutAside />
    </el-aside>
    <el-container>
      <el-header id="layout-header" height="50px">
        <LayoutHeader />
      </el-header>
      <el-main id="layout-main">
        <LayoutMain />
      </el-main>
    </el-container>
  </el-container>
</template>
<script>
// 组件
import LayoutAside from "./components/aside";
import LayoutHeader from "./components/header";
import LayoutMain from "./components/main";
// 3.0 API
import { computed } from "@vue/composition-api";
export default {
  name: "Layout",
  components: { LayoutAside, LayoutHeader, LayoutMain },
  setup(props, { root }) {
    const collapse = computed(() => root.$store.state.app.collapse);
    return { collapse };
  }
};
</script>
<style lang="scss" scpoed>
#layout-container {
  height: 100vh;
}
#layout-aside {
  background-color: #344a5f;
  @include webkit(transition, all 0.3s ease 0s);
}
#layout-header {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
  @include webkit(box-shadow, 0 0 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2));
}
#layout-main {
  border: 20px solid #f7f7f7;
  background-color: #fff;
  padding: 20px;
}
</style>
